targets.rawSql:
select (start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time, CONCAT(name,' Avg') as metric, AVG(mean * scale) as value from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id
where  start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds} and name like '%Power%'
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time

select (start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time, CONCAT(name,' Min') as metric, MIN(min * scale) as value from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id
where  start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds} and name like '%Power%' 
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time

select (start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time, CONCAT(name,' Max') as metric, MAX(max * scale) as value from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id
where  start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds} and name like '%Power%'
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time

select (start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time,
       AVG(COALESCE(state, max)) as import
from statistics_short_term
join statistics_meta on statistics_meta.id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id
where start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND
      start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds} AND
      statistic_id = 'sensor.home_total'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select (start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time,
       AVG(state) as total
from statistics_short_term
join statistics_meta on statistics_meta.id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id
where start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND 
      start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds} AND
      statistic_id = 'sensor.home_kwh'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

names:
SUM(mean * scale) - (
select SUM(mean * scale) from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name not like '%Home%'
where start_ts >= 1688289206 AND start_ts < 1688894006
)

targets.rawSql:
Select (MAX(start_ts)) AS time, joe_name_links.name AS metric, MAX(state) - MIN(state) from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND
name not like '%Home%' AND name like '%Total%'
where start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY joe_name_links.metadata_id

SELECT ${__to:date:seconds} AS time, (SUM(home_delta) - SUM(home_non_delta)) AS 'Home Misc' FROM
(
    Select IF (joe_name_links.name = 'Home Total', 0, MAX(state) - MIN(state)) AS home_non_delta,
           IF (joe_name_links.name = 'Home Total', MAX(state) - MIN(state), 0) AS home_delta
    from statistics_short_term
    join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND
    name like '%Total%'
    where start_ts >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND start_ts < ${__to:date:seconds}
    GROUP BY joe_name_links.metadata_id
) AS t

SELECT
(start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time,
SUM(delta)
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name = 'Home Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
GROUP BY time;

SELECT
(start_ts - (((start_ts * 1000) % $__interval_ms) / 1000.0)) as time,
SUM(delta * rate)
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name = 'Home Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND

t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY time;

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time,
joe_rate_links.name AS metric,
SUM(delta) AS value
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name = 'Home Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time,
joe_rate_links.name AS metric,
SUM(delta * rate) AS value
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name = 'Home Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time, 
CONCAT(joe_rate_links.name, ' - ', t.name) AS metric,
SUM(delta) AS value
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
joe_name_links.name,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS 
delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name like '%Total' AND name NOT LIKE 'Home%'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY time

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time,
SUM(home_delta) - SUM(known_delta) AS value,
CONCAT(joe_rate_links.name, ' - Home Misc') AS metric
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
IF (joe_name_links.name LIKE '%Home%', state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts), 0) AS home_delta,
IF (joe_name_links.name NOT LIKE '%Home%', state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts), 0) AS known_delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name like '%Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY time

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time, 
CONCAT(joe_rate_links.name, ' - ', t.name) AS metric,
SUM(delta * rate) AS value
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
joe_name_links.name,
state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts) AS 
delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name like '%Total' AND name NOT LIKE 'Home%'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY time

SELECT
MAX(start_ts) AS time,
SUM(home_delta * rate) - SUM(known_delta * rate) AS value,
CONCAT(joe_rate_links.name, ' - Home Misc') AS metric
FROM
(
SELECT
start_ts,
TIME(FROM_UNIXTIME(start_ts)) AS time_of_day,
IF (joe_name_links.name LIKE '%Home%', state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts), 0) AS home_delta,
IF (joe_name_links.name NOT LIKE '%Home%', state - LAG(state, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY start_ts), 0) AS known_delta
from statistics_short_term
join joe_name_links on joe_name_links.metadata_id = statistics_short_term.metadata_id AND name like '%Total'
where start_ts BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
) t
JOIN joe_rate_links ON t.time_of_day BETWEEN joe_rate_links.start_time AND joe_rate_links.end_time AND
t.start_ts BETWEEN joe_rate_links.valid_from_ts AND  joe_rate_links.valid_to_ts
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY time
